page.title: 10EMPLOYMENT AND SERVICES
page.content: The{Jobcentre}offers jobs mainly in offices, shops and catering. There are some other careers on offer.Some people have unrealistic ideas so they don't easily get jobs. The people who come in are aged from 18-60,the majority being about 20 years old. If the people cannot get{employment they may come in every day. In June 1985 there were 250 jobs vacant. Most of the jobs are in Winchester city centre, but some are in surrounding areas. The {Gas Showroom }used by 250-450 customers per week is busiest on Monday, Friday, Saturday. Most popular items are cookers and fires, most expensive items are fitted kitchens, and least are fires. People from a ten mile radius use the showroom. Other{services,}which are nearby, cover a similar area.
